author: smuzaffar
body:
This should fix the failing `TestFWCoreReflectionClassVersionUpdate` unit test. 

The was a bug and `scram build` was not running the edm class version that is why [scram build](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/FWCore/Reflection/test/run_classVersionUpdate.sh#L39) was not failing. As not bug has been fixed and `scram build` fails which causes this unit test to not work. 

This change allow scram to build the test library without running edm class checks during the `scram build` phase. 

Fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/46869
title: Class version update unit test fix
